Hi !

I can build 0.7.1 with maven rc1 - no errors - junit tests go just fine ! 
When I start the crawler (with webinterface - that means no parameters for $HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix) - I get the following error:
I'm running SUN java 1.4.2_02 !

any ideas ??

best
Bjarne Andersen
